divs: sighting detailsi was working the overnight shift at the wal mart in east stroudsburg, pa. on the morning of febuary 17th at around 3:30 am i went out to my truck to have a cigarette and listen to the news on my radio. i looked out of the drivers side window towards interstate 80 which is south of the store. i saw a small white light in the sky i first thought was a plane dead centered over a small wooded mountain south of the interstate about 1 1\2 miles away. the light grew brighter and larger. from my perspective lets say from a pencil point to 1\2 inch diameter at arms length. the light hoovered for about 2 minutes then began to slowly drop. as it neared the mountain the light it emmitted lit the peak to the point i could see the shadows cast on the snow by the trees on the northern slope of the hill. the main body of the object dropped behind the mountain but i could still see it's light. the light grew brighter for a few seconds and then disapeared. i know the area of that little peak very well and there is nothing but woods and a small lake behind it and no place for a helicopter or plane to land. i've added a google earth capture with a black line showing my position in the parking lot to the estimated area of my sighting.
Summary: I was sitting in my truck on a break from work when I saw what I first thought was a small plane grow bright then slowly desend behind a mountian.
